title: High School
name: Birla Public School
info: Birla Public School is one of Qatar's most prestigious Indian Schools that follow the Central Board of Secondary Education's Curriculum.
content: My entire schooling was done at BPS (Grade 1-12). I graduated at the top of my batch in Computer Science with a score of 99/100.

name: College of Engineering, Guindy, Anna University
title: Undergraduate
info: The College of Engineering, Guindy is a public engineering college in Chennai, India and is Asia's oldest technical institution, founded in 1794. Currently, it acts as the main campus for Anna University
content: I am currently pursuing my under-graduate degree in BE Computer Science and Engineering at CEG. In my 7 semesters here, I have been blessed with the opportunities to grow in knowledge and maturity
